mapper.insert: insert into members(member_name, member_email, member_tel, member_pwd, member_gender, rank_no, join_date, member_nick) values(#{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberTel}, password(#{memberPWD}), #{memberGender}, 2, now(),#{memberNick})
mapper.select: select mbs.member_no, mbs.rank_no, mrk.rank_name, from members mbs left join ranks mrk on mrk.rank_no = mbs.rank_no where mbs.member_email=#{memberEmail} and mbs.member_pwd=password(#{memberPWD})
mapper.update: update members set member_tel = #{memberTel}, trainer_no=#{trainerNo} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select mbs.member_email, mbs.member_name, mrk.rank_name, mbs.member_Tel, mbs.member_Gender, mbs.join_Date, trs.trainer_no, trs.trainer_name from members mbs left join ranks mrk on mrk.rank_no = mbs.rank_no left join trainers trs on mbs.trainer_no = trs.trainer_no where mbs.member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_email from members where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_nick from members where member_nick = #{memberNick}
mapper.update: update members set rank_no = #{memberRank} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into trainers(member_no, trainer_name, center_name, centeraddr_si, centeraddr_gu, centeraddr_detail, signin_date) value(#{memberNo}, (select member_name from members where member_no=#{memberNo}), #{centerName},#{centerAddrSi},#{centerAddrGu},#{centerAddrDetail}, now())
mapper.select: select mbs.member_no, tns.trainer_no, rk.rank_name, mbs.member_tel, tns.center_name from members mbs left join rank rk on rk.rank_no = mbs.rank_no left join trainers tns on mbs.member_no = tns.member_no where mbs.member_name = #{trainerName}
